name: Popover Tool
author: Chintesh Prajapati

sections.description:
We can add popover content on selected text in wordpress block it’s available on all blocks which have toolbar like paragraph block, heading block etc…

Special Features

  • Ability to add popover on text

Feedback

  • I am open for your suggestions and feedback – Thank you for using or trying my plugin!
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire Popover tool folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 5.0 or higher

Manual Installation

  1. Unzip the files and upload the folder into your plugins folder (/wp-content/plugins/) overwriting older versions if they exist
  2. Activate the plugin in your WordPress admin area.
sections.faq:
Does this plugin work with newest WP version and also older versions?

Yes, this plugin works really fine with WordPress 5.1!
It also works great with older version as well as latest version also.

In which WordPress version this Plugin is compatible?

It is compatible from 2.1 to 5.1 WordPress version.
